description: Diversify your capital across hundreds of cryptocurrencies in one click. Select a fund with a composition that matches your opinion on the market and let the manager readjust while the market evolves.
title: Funds

tooltips.title: Name of the fund
tooltips.balance: Current market value of all assets in the fund
tooltips.investors: Number of investors in the fund.
tooltips.drawdown: Maximum drawdown of the fund during the selected date range.
tooltips.profit: Profit of the fund during the selected date range
